name: Bestgovernmentfacts
0:
”Alexa, open best government facts”
”talk to best government facts”
”Alexa, start best government facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best government facts
des: This skill will help you to learn good facts which you need to know about the Indian Government, like it will let you know about when India got its Independence , how government manages GDP of India and what is the population of India. Everything under one voice app also will make you learn about lot of new government facts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
